segments.text: Oh, those kids are up to no good, I can tell.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on that wobbly stool, reaching for the cookie jar like it's a treasure chest.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm surprised he hasn't fallen yet, the way that stool is tilting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the girl, she's just standing there, waiting for her share of the loot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're being so quiet and sneaky, thinking they won't get caught.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But they don't realize that the real danger is the water all over the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit annoyed that they're not being more careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone could really get hurt here, and it's not just about the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they realize the risk they're taking before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just making me more and more anxious.
segments.speaker: PAR
